english.segment1: Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight
english.segment2: . Starting out I felt like. I had time. To properly prepare. for this climb. Now I've just left, I'm out of breath. And falling far behind. Too tired to run, but running out of time
english.segment3: . Don't look down now. Don't look down
english.segment4: . I'm growing tired. of climbing higher. Your love is all I have. to keep me strong. As I'm ascending, I feel you with me. You wait with. outstretched arms. In case I fall back down
english.segment5: . Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight
english.segment6: . Every time I take. your hand. It seems things just. go as planned. Sometimes I feel with. two free hands. I may accomplish more. But that's just one. more hand to. Break my fall when. I fall short
english.segment7: . Don't look down now. Don't look down
english.segment8: . I'm growing tired. of climbing higher. Your love is all I have. to keep me strong. As I'm ascending, I feel you with me. You wait with. outstretched arms. In case I fall back down
english.segment9: . Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight
english.segment10: . Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight. Back down, don't you back down baby tonight
english.segment11: . I'm growing tired. of climbing higher. Your love is all I have. to keep me strong. As I'm ascending, I feel you with me. You wait with. outstretched arms. In case I fall
english.segment12: . I'm growing tired. of climbing higher. Your love is all I have. to keep me strong. So keep me strong
english.segment13: . Back Down, don't you baby tonight
